casebody.data:
Tiffany WESTLUND and Tim Sedlock
v.
NATIONAL UNION FIRE INS. COMPANY OF PITTSBURGH, PA, et al. No. 2018-CC-0725 Supreme Court of Louisiana. September 14, 2018 Writ denied. Adequate remedy on appeal. CRICHTON, J., would grant and docket and assigns reasons. GENOVESE, J., would grant and docket. CRICHTON, J., would grant and docket and assigns reasons I would grant the defendant's and docket this matter to examine whether La. Civil Code article 2315.1 includes damages for "loss of life" as an element of the survival action damages.
